scripts.wasm-dev: wasm-pack --quiet --log-level=error build --dev --target=bundler --out-dir=.build/wasm-dev/ --out-name=nextclade-wasm && mkdir -p src/gen/ && cp .build/wasm-dev/* src/gen/
scripts.wasm-prod: wasm-pack --quiet --log-level=error build --release --target=bundler --out-dir=.build/wasm-prod/ --out-name=nextclade-wasm && mkdir -p src/gen/ && cp .build/wasm-prod/* src/gen/
